name: cfde_submission_registry
title: A customized CFDE-CC submission registry with Chaise display directives

resources.name: dcc
resources.title: Onboarded DCC
resources.description: Each onboarded DCC who may submit datapackages to the CFDE-CC.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this DCC, issued by the CFDE-CC.

fields.name: dcc_name
fields.title: DCC Name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, label for this DCC

fields.name: dcc_abbreviation
fields.title: Abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this contact's DCC

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this DCC

fields.name: contact_email
fields.description: Email address of this DCC's primary contact.

fields.name: contact_name
fields.description: Name of this DCC's primary contact.

fields.name: dcc_url
fields.title: DCC URL
fields.description: URL of the front page of the website for this DCC

compact.comment: The identify of the DCC onboarded with the CFDE-CC.
The primary contact of the DCC.

compact/select.comment: The identify of the DCC onboarded with the CFDE-CC.
The primary contact of the DCC.

resources.name: id_namespace
resources.title: ID Namespace
resources.description: Each identifier namespace registered with the CFDE-CC for use with datapackage submissions.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this identifier namespace

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this identifier namespace

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this identifier namespace

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this identifier namespace

resources.name: group
resources.title: Registered Group
resources.description: Each group registered for use with the CFDE-CC.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The Globus Groups system's bare UUID for this group.

fields.name: webauthn_id
fields.description: The DERIVA authentication system's identifier for the group, e.g. https://auth.globus.org/UUID-VALUE-HERE.

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable label for this group.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this group

resources.name: group_role
resources.title: Group Role Term
resources.description: Coded vocabulary for a group's role within the submission system.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this role concept.

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, label for this role concept.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this role concept.

resources.name: id_namespace_role
resources.title: ID Namespace Role Term
resources.description: Coded vocabulary for a namespace's role within the submission system.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this role concept.

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, label for this role concept.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this role concept.

resources.name: datapackage_status
resources.title: Datapackage Status Term
resources.description: Coded vocabulary for datapackage automated lifecycle states known by the datapackage submission system.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this status concept.

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, label for this status concept.

fields.name: css_class
fields.description: A presentation hint used internally by the portal.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this status concept.

resources.name: release_status
resources.title: Release Status Term
resources.description: Coded vocabulary for release lifecycle states known by the submission system.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this status concept.

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, label for this status concept.

fields.name: dp_rank
fields.description: Prioritized ordering of release state as characterization of a constituent datapackage.

fields.name: css_class
fields.description: A presentation hint used internally by the portal.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this status concept.

resources.name: approval_status
resources.title: Approval Status Term
resources.description: Coded vocabulary for approval-decision states known by the datapackage submission system.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this status concept.

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, label for this status concept.

fields.name: css_class
fields.description: A presentation hint used internally by the portal.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this status concept.

resources.name: datapackage_table_status
resources.title: Datapackage Tabular Resource Status Term
resources.description: Coded vocabulary for datapackage tabular file lifecycle states known by the datapackage submission system.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this status concept.

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, label for this status concept.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this status concept.

resources.name: datapackage_metric
resources.title: Datapackage Metric
resources.description: Coded vocabulary for a measurement concept applied to datapackages.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this measurement concept.

fields.name: rank
fields.description: A sorting ordinal for listing metrics in the portal

fields.name: hide
fields.description: Whether to hide the metric in portal FAIR displays

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, label for this measurement concept.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this measurement concept.

resources.name: datapackage
resources.title: Submitted Datapackage
resources.description: Each submitted datapackage currently tracked by the CFDE-CC.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this datapackage issued by the CFDE-CC for internal use.

fields.name: submitting_dcc
fields.title: Submitting DCC
fields.description: The identifier for the DCC submitting this datapackage.

fields.name: submitting_user
fields.description: The DERIVA webauthn user identity for the originating user.

fields.name: submission_time
fields.description: A timestamp for when the datapackage was submitted to the CFDE-CC.

fields.name: datapackage_url
fields.title: Datapackage URL
fields.description: URL of this datapackage in CFDE-CC controlled storage.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this datapackage.

fields.name: status
fields.description: A coded value for the current lifecycle status of the datapackage within the submission pipeline.

fields.name: dcc_approval_status
fields.title: DCC Approval Status
fields.description: A coded value for the post-review DCC approval of this datapackage.

fields.name: cfde_approval_status
fields.title: CFDE Approval Status
fields.description: A coded value for the post-review CFDE-CC approval of this datapackage.

fields.name: decision_time
fields.description: A timestamp for when the datapackage reached a final decision status from the DCC and CFDE-CC.

fields.name: review_ermrest_url
fields.title: EMRrest API URL
fields.description: URL of ermrest catalog to review this datapackage.

fields.name: review_browse_url
fields.title: Browse URL
fields.description: URL of review HTML UI for this datapackage.

fields.name: review_summary_url
fields.title: Summary URL
fields.description: URL of review HTML summary page for this datapackage.

fields.name: diagnostics
fields.description: Diagnostic error information to augment coded status values.

scope_acl: this dummy acl is replaced by registry configurator
this dummy acl is replaced by registry configurator

display.markdown_pattern:
|  |  |
|---|---|
| Submission Time | {{submission_time}} |
| Submission ID | {{id}} |
| Description | {{description}} |
| Submitter | {{$fkeys.CFDE.datapackage_submitting_user_fkey.rowName}} |
| DCC | {{$fkeys.CFDE.datapackage_submitting_dcc_fkey.rowName}} |
| Review Submission | {{#_review_browse_url}}[Browse Datapackage]({{.}}), {{/_review_browse_url}}{{#_review_summary_url}}[View Summary Page]({{.}}){{/_review_summary_url}} |

S_status_extra.comment: The status of the datapackage in the submission system.

display.markdown_pattern:
|  |  |
|---|---|
| Ingest Status | {{{$fkeys.CFDE.datapackage_status_fkey.rowName}}}|
| DCC Approval Status | {{$fkeys.CFDE.datapackage_dcc_approval_status_fkey.rowName}} |
| Release Status | {{S_release_status_array.0.rowName}} |
{{#if diagnostics}}| Diagnostics | :span:{{{diagnostics}}}:/span: |
{{/if}}| Download | [Raw Data]({{{_datapackage_url}}})|

S_urls_brief.comment: Links to content related to this submission.

S_urls.comment: Links to content related to this submission.

S_releases.comment: Releases with this datapackage as a constituent part.

S_release_statuses.comment: Status of release(s) with this datapackage as a constituent part.

S_release_status_array.comment: Status of release(s) with this datapackage as a constituent part.

S_datapackage_tables.comment: Tabular data resources included in this submission.

S_datapackage_measurements.comment: Assessment values (measurements) for various FAIR assessment metrics applied to this submission.

S_sample_prep_method.comment: Sample prep method terms used in submission

S_analysis_type.comment: Analysis type terms used in submission

S_assay_type.comment: Assay type terms used in submission

S_data_type.comment: Data type terms used in submission

S_dbgap_study_id.comment: dbGaP study IDs used in submission

S_disease_assoc_type.comment: Disease association types used in submission

S_file_format.comment: File format terms used in submission

S_phenotype_assoc_type.comment: Phenotype association types used in submission

S_subject_granularity.comment: Subject granularity terms used in submission

S_subject_role.comment: Subject role terms used in submission

resources.name: datapackage_measurement
resources.title: Datapackage Measurement
resources.description: Measurement data characterizing a datapackage.

fields.name: datapackage
fields.description: Identifier for the datapackage being measured.

fields.name: metric_rank
fields.description: Denormalized copy of metric.rank for use in portal UI,

fields.name: metric
fields.description: Identifier for the measurement concept being reported.

fields.name: value
fields.description: Numerical measurement value being reported.

fields.name: numerator
fields.description: Numerator component when reported value is a ratio.

fields.name: denominator
fields.description: Denominator component when reported value is a ratio.

fields.name: comment
fields.description: Auxilliary human-readable text describing the measurement.

resources.name: datapackage_table
resources.title: Submitted Datapackage Tabular Resource
resources.description: Constituent submitted datapackage currently tracked by the CFDE-CC.

fields.name: datapackage
fields.description: The identifier for the datapackage as issued by the CFDE-CC.

fields.name: position
fields.description: The integer index (0-based) of the tabular resource within the datapackage

fields.name: table_name
fields.description: The reported table name for this tabular resource.

fields.name: status
fields.description: A coded value for the current lifecycle status of the datapackage tabular file within the submission pipeline.

fields.name: num_rows
fields.description: The number of rows found in this tabular input

fields.name: diagnostics
fields.description: Diagnostic error information to augment coded status values.

S_status_extra.comment: The status of this tabular resource in the submision system.

resources.name: release
resources.title: CFDE Release
resources.description: Each defined release known by the submission system.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this release issued by the CFDE-CC for internal use.

fields.name: status
fields.description: A coded value for the current lifecycle status of the release within the submission pipeline.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this datapackage.

fields.name: cfde_approval_status
fields.title: CFDE Approval Status
fields.description: A coded value for the post-review CFDE-CC approval of this release.

fields.name: release_time
fields.description: A timestamp for when the release was completed by the CFDE-CC.

fields.name: ermrest_url
fields.title: ERMrest URL
fields.description: URL of ermrest catalog with the release content.

fields.name: browse_url
fields.title: Browse URL
fields.description: URL of HTML browsing UI for this release.

fields.name: summary_url
fields.title: Summary URL
fields.description: URL of HTML summary page for this release.

fields.name: diagnostics
fields.description: Diagnostic error information to augment coded status values.

display.markdown_pattern:
|  |  |
|---|---|
| Creation Time | {{RCT}} |
| Release Time | {{release_time}} |
| Release ID | {{id}} |
| Description | {{description}} |
| Preview | {{#if _browse_url}}[Browse Release]({{_browse_url}}){{/if}}{{#if _summary_url}}, [View Dashboard Page]({{_summary_url}}){{/if}} |

S_status_extra.comment: Status of this release in the submission system.

display.markdown_pattern:
|  |  |
|---|---|
| Build Status | {{$fkeys.CFDE.release_status_fkey.rowName}} |
| CFDE Approval Status | {{#with $fkeys.CFDE.release_cfde_approval_status_fkey}}{{rowName}}{{/with}} |
| Diagnostics | {{diagnostics}} |
| Data | {{#if _ermrest_url}}[ERMrest Catalog]({{_ermrest_url}}){{/if}} |

S_dccs.comment: DCC's submission is a constituent part of this release

S_datapackages.comment: Datapackage is a constituent part of this release

resources.name: dcc_group_role
resources.title: DCC Group Role
resources.description: Trinary association linking IDs representing (1) a DCC, (2) a group (a Globus Group registered for use with the submission system), (2) a group role (a coded value for the purpose of a group within the submission system)

fields.name: dcc
fields.description: Identifier for one DCC.

fields.name: group
fields.description: Identifier for one group.

fields.name: role
fields.description: Concept identifier for the role assigned to this group with respect to this group.

resources.name: dcc_id_namespace_role
resources.title: DCC Namespace Role
resources.description: Trinary association linking IDs representing (1) a DCC, (2) an identifier namespace, (2) a namespace role (a coded value for how the namespace is related to the DCC)

fields.name: dcc
fields.description: Identifier for one DCC.

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier for one identifier namespace.

fields.name: role
fields.description: Concept identifier for the role assigned to this namespace with respect to this group.

resources.name: dcc_release_datapackage
resources.title: DCC Release Datapackage
resources.description: Trinary association linking IDs representing (1) a DCC, (2) a planned release, (2) a submitted datapackage constituent of the release.

fields.name: dcc
fields.title: DCC
fields.description: Identifier for one DCC.

fields.description: Identifier for one release.

fields.description: Identifier for one datapackage submitted by this DCC.

resources.name: ERMrest_Client
resources.title: ERMrest Client
resources.description: Authentication information each logged in user.

fields.name: ID
fields.description: The authentication system ID for the user

fields.name: Display_Name
fields.description: The display name for the user

fields.name: Full_Name
fields.description: The full name for the user

fields.name: Email
fields.description: The email address for the user

fields.name: Client_Object
fields.description: The email address for the user

resources.name: user_profile
resources.title: User Profile
resources.description: Profile and settings for each CFDE user who opts in.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The authentication system ID for the user who owns the profile.

fields.name: display_name
fields.description: The display name for the user

fields.name: full_name
fields.description: The full name for the user

fields.name: dashboard_state
fields.description: The serialized state of the dashboard for this user

display.markdown_pattern: {{#if (eq $session.client.id _id)}}{{#if $session.client.extensions}}{{#if $session.client.extensions.has_ras_permissions}}{{#each $session.client.extensions.ras_dbgap_permissions}}`{{{this.phs_id}}}`{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}_none_{title="A RAS-aware login provider was used for this session, but no dbGaP permissions were found for the user."}{{/if}}{{else}}_not supported by login method_{title="This session used a login provider that is not RAS-aware, so dbGaP permission status is not known for the user."}{{/if}}{{/if}}

entry.comment: Select the profile owner (your own identity, unless you are an administrator)

resources.name: saved_query
resources.title: Saved Search
resources.description: A CFDE portal search saved by a user.

fields.name: user_id
fields.description: The authentication system ID for the user who saved the search.

fields.name: schema_name
fields.description: The name of the schema containing the table being searched.

fields.name: table_name
fields.description: The name of the table being searched.

fields.name: query_id
fields.description: The client-generated unique ID for the saved search's filters (i.e. hash).

fields.name: facets
fields.description: The CFDE/DERIVA machine-readable JSON description of the faceted search criteria

fields.name: encoded_facets
fields.description: The URL-encoded, machine-readable JSON version of faceted search criteria

fields.name: name
fields.title: Search Name
fields.description: A short, human-readable title for the saved search.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable summary of the saved search's purpose and/or search criteria.

fields.name: last_execution_time
fields.title: Last Searched
fields.description: A timestamp for when the saved search was most recently executed by the user.

compact.comment: A short, human-readable title, linked to a page performing the saved search.

compact/brief.comment: A short, human-readable title, linked to a page performing the saved search.

*.comment: A link to a page performing the saved search.
